topics.body:
On the subject of camel spiders, they are in fact harmless. Just ugly. They cannot in fact kill a camel and most of what you hear about them is soldiers like me lying our asses off because civilians will believe anything.

Here are some real fakts about them though: They appear to chase people, giving them an unwarranted reputation for aggression. However, they just want to stay in the shade.

They will also chew off clumps of human hair while we sleep, as they use it for nesting material.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee88eb6368722c74622100#post_54ee88eb6368722c74622100
I can only imagine what would happen if you caught one chewing off your hair. It's like "Yo your hair is super soft. Mind if I have some for my babbies?"
